description: The beer I want is always gone. But also...BK bar alert. Warm draft and cold high life.

name: St. Anselm
description: IF YOU LIKE HOT SAISON AND EXPENSIVE FOOD... THIS IS IT

description: If there weren't photos of this, I might not have remembered I was here.

description: Beatiful view, and just kind of okay beers. Worth the trip, but only cause of that horizon.

name: The Smith
description: I wish I could hate the smith but calamari and beer is never disappointing here

description: Inconsistent draft temps make this a risky bet but damn is the food incredible

name: Kings Co Imperial
description: Inconsistent draft temps make this a risky bet but damn is the food incredible

description: Cold beer and the best specialtly sports gear in town.

description: Pool for the boys, cold beer for the boys, chill.

description: Corporate beer and golf are not a bad combination

name: Rudy's

name: Ssam Bar
description: Closed! But used to be a fantastic spot in the city despite its location.

name: Ebbs
description: A rad spot to catch a game, a brew, or a cocktail with friends. Best Brewery vibes in the city.

name: Evil Twin Dumbo
description: Somehow makes DUMBO seem okay within those walls. Evil Twin has the best beer names in the game.
beer: Back in a NY State of Mind

name: Keg and Lantern Greenpoint
description: K&L always nails the vibe but some inconsistent draft temps at a brewery is sus

name: Bernie's
description: COLD BEER IN A FROSTY AND SMASH BURGERS. GO GO GO. GO AGAIN. FUCK

name: Keg and Lantern Red Hook
description: Friendly bar vibes and good craft beer. Do you think they clean the cans before they go in the wall?

name: Greenpoint Fish & Lobster
description: Better lobster rolls than beer, fortunately.

name: Greenpoint Beer & Ale
description: Worst Brooklyn brewery, second warmest brewery beer in NYC. Sadly I still love the place. GET BETTER

name: Mao Mao
description: Young,trendy, cheap, delicious, and includes some craft beer on the list. Respect

name: Ornithology
description: Best jazz club in brooklyn. Hard to get a drink in the back room but the jazz is good and beer is cold.

name: Panzón
description: Brand new spot, billboards up in brooklyn to hype it, and the draft isn't cold. Cocktails were meh too.

name: Bees Knees & Honey
description: Service is a little slow but joint isn't pushing their servers with too many tables these days.

name: Kinoko
description: Cajun/Japanese Fusion. Great food. Cans were probably cold enough but pouring to a glass warmed it up.

name: Rose's R&R
description: 30-40s crowd and you would hope for better draft but unfortunately its only the decor that is cool.

name: Tom & Joans
description: Frosty mugs make me happy and this place is young and fun.

name: Ore Bar
description: Great local draft selection, vibe is pumping, and the bartenders are just disgruntled enough.
